title: Welcome to Flavortown | Guests: Justin Haskins & Shelby Talcott | 6/23/20
description:
America is an idea, and the incredible story of television’s inventor is proof. White Jesus statues may be the mob’s next targets. The Heartland Institute’s Justin Haskins joins to expose the World Economic Forum’s chilling plan to globally reset capitalism in the wake of coronavirus, called "the Great Reset." The “summer of love” in Seattle’s CHOP is coming to an end after two shootings and one death. A petition to change the name of Columbus, Ohio, to “Flavortown” is gaining momentum. Glenn hears from a "proud" citizen of Flavortown and other listeners across the country. The Daily Caller’s Shelby Talcott was attacked by protesters trying to create an autonomous zone outside the White House and tear down an Andrew Jackson statue.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
